Smart Hanger: A clothes hanger with built-in sensors that detect when an item of clothing is removed or added, automatically adjusting the angle and position of the hanger to optimize airflow and reduce wrinkles. (Confidence Score: 0.8)

Closet Organizer: A clothes hanger with interchangeable dividers and pockets, allowing users to customize the hanger to suit their specific storage needs. This could include separate sections for dresses, suits, and casual wear, as well as small pockets for accessories like scarves and hats. (Confidence Score: 0.9)

Air-Dry Hanger: A clothes hanger with a built-in fan or heating element that dries clothes quickly and reduces wrinkles. This could be especially useful for people who live in humid climates or who travel frequently. (Confidence Score: 0.8)

Smart Hanger with AI: A clothes hanger that uses artificial intelligence to analyze the type of clothing hung on it and provide personalized styling recommendations. For example, the hanger could suggest pairing a particular dress with a specific pair of shoes or accessories based on the user's past purchases and preferences. (Confidence Score: 0.9)

Augmented Reality Hanger: A clothes hanger with a built-in augmented reality display that allows users to see how their clothes will look in different outfits without having to physically try them on. This could be especially useful for people who are shopping online or who are unsure of how to style certain pieces in their wardrobe. (Confidence Score: 0.9)
